title: User OTP-based Authentication Success
description: Verify that users can successfully sign up and log in using correct phone number OTP verification.

steps.description: Navigate to user login page
Enter valid phone number and request OTP
Input received OTP correctly
Submit OTP for verification
User successfully authenticated and redirected to homepage/dashboard

title: User OTP Authentication - Incorrect OTP Handling
description: Verify system behavior when an incorrect OTP is entered by the user during login/signup.

steps.description: Navigate to user login page
Enter valid phone number and request OTP
Input incorrect OTP
Submit OTP for verification
Display error message indicating OTP is invalid and prompt to retry

title: Agent Email/Password Authentication with IATA Document Upload and Admin Approval
description: Test agent signup with email/password, with IATA certificate upload, and ensure admin approval is required for access.

steps.description: Navigate to agent signup page
Fill in valid email, password, and other required information
Upload valid IATA certificate document
Submit signup form
Agent receives notification that approval is pending
Admin logs into admin dashboard and reviews pending agent approvals
Admin approves the agent account
Agent attempts login with email/password after approval
Agent successfully logged in and redirected to agent dashboard

title: Agent Email/Password Authentication Failure Due to Missing IATA Document
description: Ensure agent signup is rejected or requires document upload if IATA certificate is missing or invalid.

steps.description: Navigate to agent signup page
Fill in valid email and password but do not upload IATA certificate
Submit signup form
Signup rejected with clear validation message about mandatory IATA document

title: Host and Admin Email/Password Authentication Success
description: Validate host and admin user authentication with valid credentials and protected routing after login.

steps.description: Navigate to Host login page
Enter valid host email and password
Submit login
Host is authenticated and redirected to host dashboard
Navigate to Admin login page
Enter valid admin email and password
Submit login
Admin is authenticated and redirected to admin dashboard
Attempt to access role-protected routes without login
Access denied and redirected to login page

title: Property Search with Filters and Date/Guest Selection
description: Test property search functionality with various filter combinations, date ranges, and guest numbers to verify correct filtering and results.

steps.description: Navigate to property search page
Select filters like location, amenities, property type, and price range
Select valid date range using calendar component
Select number of guests
Initiate search
Search results update accurately reflecting all selected filters, date availability, and guest capacity
Clear all filters and search again
All properties in database are returned or default listing is shown

title: Property Detail Viewing and Room/Rate Plan Selection
description: Verify property details page displays accurate information and allows room and rate plan selection with pricing calculations.

steps.description: From search results, select a property to view details
Property details display including images, description, amenities, reviews, and availability calendar
Select check-in and check-out dates
Select guests
Choose available rooms and rate plans
Prices are calculated correctly based on selection, discounts, and date ranges

title: Booking Flow with Razorpay Payment Success
description: Test end-to-end booking flow including order creation, payment via Razorpay, payment success handling, and booking confirmation display.

steps.description: Complete property selection, date, room, and rate plan choices
Proceed to booking payment page
Initiate Razorpay payment and provide valid payment details
Razorpay order is created successfully and payment is processed
Payment success callback triggers and booking is confirmed
Booking confirmation page displays correct booking details and success message

title: Booking Flow with Razorpay Payment Failure Handling
description: Validate appropriate handling when Razorpay payment fails or is canceled, with user notified and booking not confirmed.

steps.description: Navigate through booking flow to payment page
Attempt Razorpay payment but simulate failure or cancellation
System detects payment failure or cancellation
Booking is not finalized and no confirmation is shown
User receives clear failure message and options to retry payment or cancel booking

title: Redux State Management Persistence After Reload
description: Ensure critical state slices like authentication and property search persist correctly across page reloads using Redux Persist.

steps.description: Login as any user role and perform property search with filters
Redux store shows correct auth state and search filter state
Reload the application page
User remains authenticated and search filters remain applied

title: Role-based Protected Route Access Control
description: Verify that protected routes for users, agents, hosts, and admins are only accessible by authenticated users with correct role.

steps.description: Attempt to access protected user dashboard route without login
Redirected to login page
Login as user and access user dashboard route
Access granted
Login as agent and attempt to access admin dashboard route
Access denied or redirected due to role mismatch
Login as admin and access admin dashboard route
Access granted

title: User Profile View and Edit Functionality
description: Test that users can view their profile data and perform edits which are validated and saved successfully.

steps.description: Login as regular user
Navigate to user profile page
Profile information is displayed correctly
Edit profile fields with valid data
Save changes
Profile updates are saved and reflect in UI
Attempt invalid data input and save
Validation errors are shown and changes are not saved

title: User Booking History Viewing and Details
description: Verify that users can view their past and upcoming bookings with detailed booking information.

steps.description: Login as user with existing bookings
Navigate to user bookings page
List of bookings is displayed with summary info
Select a booking to view details
Detailed booking information including property name, dates, guests, payment status, and cancellation options are shown

title: Admin CRUD Operations for Properties
description: Test admin's ability to create, read, update, and delete properties via the admin dashboard, confirming data persistence and UI updates.

steps.description: Login as admin
Navigate to properties management page
Create a new property with valid data
New property appears in property list with correct details
Edit existing property details and save
Property details updated correctly
Delete a property
Property is removed from the list and database

title: Admin Booking Status Management and Cancellation
description: Validate admin can view all bookings, update statuses, and manage cancellations properly.

steps.description: Login as admin
Navigate to all bookings management page
All bookings are visible with status and user/property info
Change booking status (e.g., confirmed to cancelled)
Booking status updates successfully and reflects in database
Process cancellation requests and confirm handling
Cancellation processed with notifications sent

title: Agent Approval Workflow and Discount Management by Admin
description: Check that admin can approve or reject agents and set discount rates, with proper access control and notifications.

steps.description: Login as admin
Navigate to agent management page
Pending agent signups are listed with uploaded documentation
Approve an agent
Agent status updates to approved and agent receives notification
Set a discount rate for an approved agent
Discount is applied correctly and reflected in bookings involving the agent

title: Host Dashboard Statistics and Booking Management
description: Verify hosts can view real-time property statistics, booking summaries, and manage their property bookings accurately.

steps.description: Login as host
Navigate to host dashboard
Dashboard shows accurate current statistics such as total bookings, revenue, and occupancy rates
Navigate to host bookings management page
List of bookings for host's properties is displayed with booking details
Modify booking statuses where applicable
Booking statuses update correctly and notifications are sent if required

title: Wishlist Functionality for Users
description: Test that users can add properties to their wishlist, view the wishlist, and remove properties from it.

steps.description: Login as a user
Navigate to a property detail page
Add property to wishlist
Property is added and visible in user wishlist
Remove property from wishlist
Property is removed and no longer displayed in wishlist

title: User Review and Rating Submission for Properties
description: Check that logged-in users can submit property reviews and ratings and edits are properly saved and displayed.

steps.description: Login as user
Navigate to a booked property detail page
Submit a new review with rating, text feedback, and optional images
Review is saved and visible under property reviews
Edit previously submitted review
Updated review is saved and updated in UI

title: Static Informational Pages Rendering
description: Verify static pages such as About Us, Contact, FAQ, Legal and Agent How-To pages render correct content and are accessible from navigation.

steps.description: Navigate to About Us page
Page content is displayed correctly with no missing elements
Navigate to Contact Us page
Contact form and information are visible and interactive
Navigate to FAQ page
FAQ entries expand and collapse correctly
Navigate to Legal Info and How-To agent pages
Content loads without errors and includes all intended information

title: API Service Layer Axios Call Success and Error Handling
description: Validate central API service correctly handles expected responses and gracefully handles server errors for various endpoints.

steps.description: Trigger successful API request to fetch properties
Response data is correctly returned and updated in state
Force an API failure (e.g., by simulating server error)
Error response is caught, displayed with user-friendly notifications, and does not crash the app

title: Media Upload and Management for Agents and Hosts
description: Test media file uploads (e.g., profile photos, IATA certificates, property images), verifying upload success, preview, and error handling.

steps.description: Login as agent and navigate to document upload section
Upload valid IATA certificate file
File upload is successful and preview shown
Upload invalid file type or exceeding size limit
Appropriate error messages are shown and file rejected
Repeat for host property images
Upload and preview function correctly

title: Performance and Responsiveness of Reusable UI Components
description: Verify major reusable UI components such as cards, modals, calendars, loaders, and notifications render correctly, respond to interactions, and do not degrade performance.

steps.description: Load pages containing cards, modals, and calendar components
Components render as per design with correct data displayed
Trigger modal open/close and date selections
Interactions behave smoothly with no UI glitches or delays
Trigger notifications and loaders
Notifications appear and disappear correctly, loaders show during async operations
